procedure.title: Call for Tenders for the provision of Hot Meals under the School Meals Scheme to Kilbride National School 17513A
procedure.description: The Board of Management of Kilbride National School is seeking proposals for the provision of Hot Meals under the School Meals Scheme through the Department of Employment Affairs and Social Protection (DEASP) and is dependent on the level of DEASP funding approved for 2024/2025. Kilbride National School intends to facilitate the availability of this service for hot meals each day of the school year for 191 students. The school calendar will be furnished to the successful company at the beginning of each school year.
